pr_title: Adding Spring Web support in OpenAPI

timeline.bodyText: Fairly minor, but would it be better to save the result of this method so that subsequent calls don't need to re-evaluate everything?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: Ok cool, in a buildItem you mean ? Or a class var ?
replies.author: phillip-kruger

replies.bodyText: Just a class var unless it's needed outside the extension
replies.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: I did not think this is expensive though ? And it's only been called twice ?
replies.author: phillip-kruger

replies.bodyText:
That's why I said it was minor.
Not a huge deal for now, but something to cleanup later
replies.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: If I do need to make a change for the exclusion I'll add this
replies.author: phillip-kruger

replies.bodyText: I'll add it to the TODO for the next version.
replies.author: phillip-kruger

timeline.message:
Adding Spring Web support in OpenAPI

Signed-off-by: Phillip Kruger <phillip.kruger@gmail.com>
